JobFullDesc: Talent Acquisition partners with Uber's businesses to understand their talent needs and find, engage, and guide candidates through the hiring process. We hire the right people for every job and help them find a team where they can make the biggest impact. About the RoleIn this role, you are the go-to person who will advise hiring teams and build the recruitment strategy to deliver an outstanding recruitment experience. We are looking for a Principal Recruiter to support multiple business lines and scale our Core Technology Group and hiring across North America. You will partner with sourcing and hiring managers to build teams across our dynamic region, and inform on hiring strategy to hire the right people for every job where they can make the biggest impact. You may also have the opportunity to work on strategic projects to improve and innovate how we attract and recruit the best talent because we know that there’s always a better way! What You'll DoProactively solves complex issues and shares the best methods with manager and teamConsiders wholistic data that underpins hiring decisions and strategizes accordinglyEffectively interprets own and immediate teams metrics analytics to build process improvements (e.g. high conversion ratios)Confidently handles objections from candidates and business and is a diplomatic and confident advisor to all parties involved[Deeply understands the businesses they support and advises on team structure, leveling, and potential implications of a hireBuilds an inclusive and objective hiring process and ensures that candidate is assessed against the appropriate competenciesAutonomously develops and implements innovative sourcing strategies across teamsIs an active mentor to other members of the team and is able to effectively ramp new joiners to be effective in their jobsRole models Uber behaviours and the recruiting craft Basic QualificationsMinimum of 6 years of professional experiencePreferred QualificationsBachelor’s degree in Business, HR, Communications or similar preferred8+ years of experience in recruitingExperience with ICIMS or other ATSExperience in full-cycle recruiting in a fast-paced environment Previous tech recruiting experience is a plusExperience interpreting data and using it to influence hiring decisionsHas partnered with a wide variety of clients, including senior level business leaders and seasoned professional candidatesHas experience hiring in an organization focused on cultivating a diverse workforce
